### `bf_pointer.ptr` (bf_pointer::ptr)

_Define the Brainfuck pointer as a global variable._


Syntax:

```
operation ::= `bf_pointer.ptr` $sym_name `=` $initial_value `:` functional-type(operands, results) attr-dict
```


Interfaces: Symbol

#### Attributes:

| Attribute | MLIR Type | Description |
| :-------: | :-------: | ----------- |
| `sym_name` | ::mlir::StringAttr | string attribute
| `initial_value` | ::mlir::IntegerAttr | index attribute
